Room.Name: Northern Crystalline City
Room.ShortDescription: This is part of the northern section of the great crystalline city.
Room.LongDescription: As in every civilization, there are those who exist as the lower ranks of society. This section of the city seems to be inhabited by those less fortunate individuals. Despite their social position, these beings are necessary to society as they provide needed services to the upper class. Someone has to take out the garbage.
